stories.text:
What you will do:

Develop & test information security policies and procedures

Test effectiveness of IT controls exist to meet applicable current and future security compliance requirements such as SOC 2 and ISO 27001.

Remediate internal controls related to IT, security, operations, and engineering

Work with internal management team to provide status of control effectiveness

Work with external auditors to assist in the completion of annual compliance audits

What you bring to the role:

Have a passion for and desire to help startup build security and compliance programs.

Excellent project management and organizational skills.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Ability to work efficiently with minimal oversight.

Comfortable in a fast-paced, ever-changing, rapid-growth, fun environment with multiple projects and tasks

0-1 years of professional experience in a technology risk or compliance related role.

What you’ll get from us:

A team where you can voice your opinion and full ownership. Tons of opportunity to learn from expert team. A chance to make an impact!

Please send us a resume if you are interested: rlakhani@lakharrow.com

stories.text:
DoorDash is currently unable to show any order information on their iOS app, as well as at least some previous orders.

Users are unable to see their order status, where their order is, or communicate with their Dasher if something goes wrong (found this out the hard way)

If you're a DoorDash SRE, just a heads up.
stories.title: Tell HN: DoorDash Is Down
